title: Foreigners can get US residency in 'record time' with Trump Gold Card
shortDescription: For a $5 million contribution, foreign high-rollers can now also avail of a "Platinum Card," which comes with tax benefits.

title: Health care costs set to rise for millions after Senate rejects bill
shortDescription: The Senate shot also shot down advancing a bill that would've deposited $1,000 to $1,500 into health savings accounts, or HSAs, for eligible consumers

title: Poll: Older voters could boost Republicans in midterms
shortDescription: Democrats celebrated recent electoral victories as they plot to take back Congress, but a new poll suggests some of that enthusiasm may be premature.

title: A look at Vanessa Trump's life with her famous family and Tiger Woods
shortDescription: Vanessa Trump was married to Donald Trump Jr. from 2006-2018. They have 5 children. Former model lives in Jupiter, Florida, and is dating Tiger Woods.

title: Indiana to vote on new congressional maps amid Trump pressure campaign
shortDescription: Indiana state lawmakers will take up the hotly debated question of whether they will pass new congressional maps ahead of the 2026 midterms.

title: Vote may reveal Trump administration's plans for controversial agency
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's appointed council to review FEMA is scheduled to vote on its final recommendations on Dec. 11, 2025.

title: Trump threatens ICC with sanctions over prosecution concerns
shortDescription: Trump administration wants the International Criminal Court to amend its charter to ensure it does not investigate the president.

title: Trump defends return of mistakenly deported Abrego Garcia
shortDescription: Aboard Air Force One on Friday (June 6), U.S. President Donald Trump defended the return of Kilmar Armando Abrego Garcia, who had been mistakenly deported, saying: “Bring him back. Show everybody how horrible this guy is.”

title: Poll paints dire picture on affordability as Trump touts economy
shortDescription: As President Trump mocks the term "affordability," a new poll found Americans are making major sacrifices to keep up with the cost of living.

title: House Votes to Release Epstein Files
shortDescription: The House voted 427 to 1 to compel the Justice Department to release its files on sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein. Joe Mathieu reports.

title: Dueling votes on lowering health care costs likely doomed in Congress
shortDescription: The Senate is set to vote on competing plans to lower health care costs. Though neither will likely pass, lawmakers are feeling the pressure to act.

title: Costco stayed out of politics. Then it sued Trump.
shortDescription: Costco's lawsuit against the president's signature economic policy has sowed discord among its unusually loyal membership. Will shoppers defect?

title: Trump pushes for CNN sale as parent company faces acquisition
shortDescription: "I think CNN should be sold," Trump said, slamming the news outlet's leadership as its parent company faces potential acquisition.

title: Trump says Colombian president is 'next'
shortDescription: President Trump appeared to threaten the president of Colombia, saying that "he's going to be next."

title: For RFK Jr., it was a bad day on Capitol Hill
shortDescription: Congress gave Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. two reasons on Dec. 10 to be in a bad mood.

title: Trump says CNN should be sold
shortDescription: President Donald Trump took aim at CNN as its parent company faces potential acquisition, saying "it's imperative" that the news network be sold.

title: Trump floats giving money to cover health care
shortDescription: President Trump said he endorses a Senate Republican plan to give Americans up to $1,500 to cover health expenses rather than extend ACA subsidies.

title: Has President Trump commented on Eileen Higgins' Miami mayoral win?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump endorsed a Republican in the Miami mayoral race, but he lost. Eileen Higgins, a Democrat, won in historic win. What did Trump say?

title: Trump says US seized 'very large' oil tanker off Venezuelan coast
shortDescription: The U.S. seized an oil tanker off the Venezuelan coast after a monthslong buildup of military forces in the region.
